before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"ams7o","text":"Use this checklist with the 'RUN' functionality of protocols.io. This can be accessed with the 'RUN' button to the left of share, when looking at the protocol in the file manager. This CAN be resumed, if not completed immediately.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hso6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"slqlb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"canfj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":null,"entityRanges":null,"data":{}},{"key":"eccjh","text":"Rename the document: '\u003cYOUR PROTOCOL\u003e  - QC Checklist'","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jv1e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gu2d","text":"Move the 'run' document in folder in the file manager under: Groups/WarinnerGroup/Protocol Publishing Checklist/Checklists.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":61,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"266n2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djlk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"61710BCF341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","height":143,"id":594105,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/public/95ba4215cced856fae314ba2429e3e562674f480c97151a6c3c4eeed7d5b8a80/bsu74tj6.png","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/uef34tj6.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/uef24tj6.webp","width":435}}}}

creator.name: James A Fellows Yates

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"de0ot","text":"This protocol serves as a QC checklist which must be completed prior for a protocol to be made public, for all protocols written by members of the Warinner Group.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: quality control, checklist, meta protocol, protocol publishing qc checklist, qc checklist, warinner group, members of the warinner group, protocol, group

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2n70j","text":"Have all editors of the protocol been added as authors?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5snvu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eb1mp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0drs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjt1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dvnpt","text":"If unsure who may have edited, please ask on the Microbiome Sciences slack workspace under the #protocols channel","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ah9v","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7knlt","text":"Commenters do not qualify as a co-author by default","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjpat","text":"Has the 'owner' of the protocol been transferred either to a main author or administrator (Tina, Irina, or Raphaela)?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jbur","text":"If this protocol has been previously published in a journal, has the citation been added under 'description'?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2451","text":"Are all materials, reagents and machines/devices added to materials?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8edap","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"62spu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"65cic","text":"This should include even simple devices such as vortexers or rotators!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a7cm","text":"Are all reagents the version that you used? If the kit has changed (e.g. MoBio kit is now renamed as PowerSoil), make sure that all future versions of the protocol have the latest version. If necessary, add this to the protocols.io database with SKU number and manufactuerers website link!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"absg4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aop38","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bk6of","text":"If a kit has been renamed, ensure that the solutions you use are also named the same as the kit","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m0iq","text":"Are all measurement units in a _universal_  format (i.e. they should be metric, or device type netural - RCF and not RPM for centrifgation)?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52bf2","text":"Optional if not a native speaker, have you had the protocol reviewed by a native speaker?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6251","text":"Has your language been reviewed for 'standard' protocol writing (i.e. as would be in a journal?) by someone experienced in the lab?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81jis","text":"Have you had your protocol approved by an administrator (Raphaela, Irina)?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eg7qd","text":"Have you had your protocol approved by the lab head (Tina)?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fokmp","text":"Are all pre-preparation steps already defined early in the protocol (e.g. cooling a rack to   )?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"af3bh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5F7E75E0F4D711E9AE9EFBF83C27CB15","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":"10"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bstdo","text":"Have you indicated pause-points for all tube labelling steps (as this can take a long time)? ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdu0f","text":"Have you had the protocol reviewed by someone not familiar with the protocol or lab (to ensure there is no assumed language) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39j7r","text":"Have you discussed with the lab whether this protocol should go through a 'public beta' phase (i.e. open for a fixed period for public comments prior publishing with a DOI)?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"102ee","text":"Have all components been added, where applicable (i.e. amounts, temperatures, duration)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a52mi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d2kqq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"32op1","text":"This can be accessed in the black bar on the right of the protocol page. These are useful when 'running' a protocol, as it provides you with timers and converters.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Protocol Publishing QC Checklist (Warinner Group)

creator.name: James A Fellows Yates
creator.affiliation: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"7skhn","text":"You must not make your protocol public until this check list has been completed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
